short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: visualize the data stored on your ipfs node

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple chrome extension for users to visualize the data stored on their local IPFS node. You may need to input a command to allow CORS(Cross Origin Resource Sharing) That command can be found within the directions here https://github.com/noryev/ipfsStatViewerChrome
